(OOC: Okay, I thought Alloran told me before that Soundwave was 
already with me. So, just so that we don't have to go back and change 
everything from the last few days, Vulois found parts from the 
original device to use the TM2 and constructed his own. He turned TM3 
and then the rest goes as I had. Sorry about all this. I've screwed 
up everything and I apoligize. I will try to be better in the future.)

Vulois can't move. Up in the raptors he is being shot at by numerous 
Predacons, including one that seems to be very dominant. This must be 
Hell Beast. The Bat Pred still sits idly by. Maybe he had gotten 
through to her. Maybe she does want to leave the preds. Before that 
thought can go any farther, a transmission comes in from Soundwave. 
Vulois responds back, whispering so the preds can't hear him.

"Soundwave, I want you to use the machine on the mountain top to turn 
yourself TM3 and than join me at the Pred base. It seems through my 
careless action of not charging my masker enough, I have almost 
ruined our chance of forming a new breed. Maybe later, but not now. 
But I still have a way we can both benefit from this. Become a TM3 
and join me at the Pred base. Vulois out.

Vulios finds a large space close to him and ducks the fire of the 
Preds. He TF's to Robot Mode and pulls out one of his blasters, just 
for protection. He yells down to them.

"Hell Beast, I wish to propose a deal. I have something you want and 
you have something I want. It is very simple. I will give you the 
secret of TM3 technology, plus return this invention to you, if 
Soundwave and I are both promoted to joint second in command. We 
would both have the same luxiuries, and have to answer only to you. 
What do you say?"
